title: Olive Hair Salon
detail:
A small business website. Olive Hair Salon is a hair salon located in Calgary, AB. 
The website is integrated with Square appointment and payment system for convenient user experience.

title: Salary Converter
detail: A very simple salary converting web app equipped with dollar formatting feature.

title: Orange City eBooks
detail:
A book search website. It uses Netlify Functions to fetch book data. Netlify Functions are serverless functions that are deployed on AWS Lambda. 
The book data is retrieved from Google Books APIs. 
(Illustrations by unDraw)

title: Google Keep Clone
detail: A clone website of Google Keep using Firebase.

title: Poultry Farm Software
detail: A poultry farm management software that display current number of chicken, chick and egg counts. Users can manipulate and search customer information with simple click of a button. It also has feature that stores farm expenses in pre-formatted text file. The files will be automatically named and sorted by date.
